ratings.comment: Surprisingly a very easy course. Prof Harvey's lecture can be mundane but regardless she knows what shes talking about and brings a lot of knowledge to the course. Would recommend this class for an easy A.

Professor Harvey is the absolute worst instructor I have ever had at any point in my academic career. She puts next to no effort into the course, clearly recycling lectures and assignments from past semesters. She does not care about her students and will not respond to your for several days, and when she does respond, don't expect any sympathy.

Took CNSR SCI 275 online and there were multiple weeks where only slides were posted for learning content with no lecture video. The weeks with videos you could tell were made at least a year ago. Quizzes weren't too difficult as they were open note but I don't think I learned much from the class.

This is seriously one of the most boring classes I have ever taken. Professor talks without any enthusiasm and gave assignments worth 25% of our grade that she never taught us. Also, she is a very tough grader on small assignments that are a hassle. The course content could have been very useful if our entire class wasn't lost, and totally bored.

I'm a senior, and this is the worst professor I have EVER had in my entire life. She talks in the slowest, most mundane voice, not bothering to engage students whatsoever. Not one student pays attention in class. She gives 0 instructions for assignments, then grades harshly, then does not respond even when you email her 5 times asking questions.

Took their class online as it wasn't offered in person. Incredibly lazy instructor. Did not go out of their way in the slightest to ensure students understand or are even interacting with the course content. Her class is a joke.
Professor Harvey is one of the best professors I've had. She is honestly pretty funny too and I had a good time learning in this class.
